relation: Great for these types of students
Lights, security, escort to car if you need it.
Rural community. If you like outdoors life is good. If you prefer the city life..you have a 40 minute drive to Sacramento.
Flavors is an all cash restaurant hosted by the culinary arts program. Prime Rib Thursday for $7 was awesome.
You get out what you put in.
Get involved and join a club. Utilize the resourses like the Student Success Center for free tutoring.
I have encountered excellent instructors in the Science Division. There are many opportunities available for students to excel. Some congestion in the higher level science classes.
pageTitle: Yuba College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Chantal from Chico, CA 07/28/2011 Reviewer is A past student here. 2 of 26 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Wanting to have fun and enjoy college. Tips for prospective students Utilize the faculty staff members office hours. Have lots of fun, it's a small college so everyone knows everyone. Bang for the buck If you are looking for what your money is worth, this is not the right school. Did enjoy being here My friends went here, but otherwise it lacked a challenge as far as the academics go. I did enjoy the small classrooms and how everyone is friendly. Did learn a lot I learnt a lot from the faculty that taught here, mainly on the politics on how the school is run. Login to rate or flag the reviews
